response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 26
response.overview: The 26th installment of a popular series that carefully selects horror videos that have been posted and introduces all 10 episodes! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time as well, in Wandering Curse, footsteps can be heard night after night, even though no one should be there. The poster was the first word. So, in order to ascertain the cause, when I set a camera on the veranda of the room, a terrifying person from another world was reflected there.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 26
